channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sarah Ferguson Asks Jeffrey Epstein to 'Just Marry Me' in Newly Released Email
item.description: The former Duchess of York also praised the convicted sex offender as "the brother I have always wished for"

item.title: Melissa Joan Hart Says She Lost 18 Lbs. by 'Cutting Sugars and Alcohol:' 'I Don't Enjoy Drinking, So Why Bother?' (Exclusive)
item.description: The actress said she dropped weight as part of her “longevity journey,” when she was “just trying to feel better”

item.title: Halle Berry 'Grateful' for Boyfriend Van Hunt, But in No Rush to Wed: 'Very Happy with Life Right Now' (Exclusive Source)
item.description: A source tells PEOPLE that Van Hunt “really gets her and treats her so well"

item.title: Eddie Murphy's Son Eric and Martin Lawrence's Daughter Jasmin Expecting First Baby Together Less Than a Year After Tying the Knot
item.description: The couple tied the knot in May 2025

item.title: Bebe Rexha Says She's Still Single but Has '3 on the Roster' Following Public Plea for a 'Baby Daddy'
item.description: Rexha gave an update on her love life in a video taken as she was out and about during the 2026 Grammys weekend
